alert.note: Alert for Benton; Jasper; Newton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 04 at 3:36PM EST until January 05 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM CST /4 AM EST/ TO 6 PM CST /7 PM EST/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds gusting 45 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Indiana, Newton, Jasper and Benton Counties. In Illinois, Kankakee, Livingston, Iroquois and Ford Counties. * WHEN...From 3 AM CST /4 AM EST/ to 6 PM CST /7 PM EST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers Wednesday morning may lead to low visibility, particularly north of a line from Flanagan to Rensselaer.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
